column18: 08/31/2013: A former presidential bodyguard attempted to attack the presidential palace in Ouagadougou, Kadiogo, Burkina Faso. The assailant, who was shot and killed, was thought to be targeting President Blaise Compaore. No group claimed responsibility for the incident.
column97: An AK-47 was used in the attack.
